page.title: 11Dairy Farm-Stanton-u-Bardon
page.content: One afternoon a group of children were taken out by Mr.Milner in his Land Rover.He told us that he{breeds {Friesian White Park and Hereford {cows.}He owns 1200 acres of land in this area and has 450 cattle all together. Mr.Milner and his helpers{milk}the cows at 5.00am and 3.00pm every day. Mr.Milner gets two-thousand five-hundred litres of milk a day. He also slaughters his animals and sells the meat. Mr Milners has a lot of expensive machines on his farm.He has three workers and six dogs.Mr.Milner is married with a family who also help on the farms. One of the{oldest}farms owned by Mr.Milner is Horsepool Grange which has a{medieval moat.
